body:
## Steps to Reproduce

I had a flutter app open. Create a new flutter Application.

## Version information

Android Studio `3.0.1` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 22.2.1` • Dart plugin `171.4424`

Flutter 0.1.4 • channel beta • https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git
Framework • revision f914e701c5 (11 days ago) • 2018-02-19 21:12:17 +0000
Engine • revision 13cf22c284
Tools • Dart 2.0.0-dev.27.0-flutter-0d5cf900b0

## Exception

Assertion failed: Network shouldn't be accessed in EDT or inside read action


comment_data.body:
Thanks for the report! I don't have a fix for the underlying problem yet. It may be a problem in the way the Flutter plugin interacts with the new project creation framework, or it may be something deeper.

The error is harmless to you but if you want to stop it from happening you can disable usage reporting.

Navigate to:

`Preferences > Appearance & Behavior > System Settings > Usage Statistics`

Then uncheck `Send usage statistics to Google`

milestone.description: Issues under consideration for upcoming milestones.
milestone.title: On Deck

title: Assertion failed: Network shouldn't be accessed in EDT or inside read action
